name: Take App
headline: Shopify for WhatsApp commerce
description:
Ecommerce for WhatsApp. We make commerce more intuitive and accessible by simplifying WhatsApp ordering. 

Founder Youmin Kim is ex-Facebook Engineering Manager who launched Facebook Marketplace and Messaging Commerce in SE Asia.

founders.name: Youmin Kim, Founder
founders.description: Maker. Founder of Take App (YC W22). Based in Singapore. Ex-Facebook.

generated_description:
### Take App Overview

**Company Name:** Take App  
**Website:** [Take App](https://www.take.app)  
**Location:** Singapore  
**Founded:** 2021  
**Founder:** Youmin Kim (ex-Facebook Engineering Manager)  
**Team Size:** 8 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W22  
**Group Partner:** Nan  

**Mission:**  
Take App aims to be the Shopify of WhatsApp commerce, focusing on making e-commerce through WhatsApp intuitive and accessible. They simplify the ordering process, empowering customers to place orders independently, thereby enhancing the overall shopping experience.

### Key Features & Services
- **WhatsApp Ordering:** Customers can place orders via a user-friendly WhatsApp order form.
- **Order Management:** Businesses can easily track order status, manage invoices, and receive notifications.
- **Payment Methods:** Accepts various local payment options, including QR codes, credit/debit cards, and cash on delivery.
- **Business Tools:** Provides features like inventory management, customer relationship management (CRM), and analytics to optimize sales performance.
- **Customizable Websites:** Businesses can create beautiful product catalogs and websites tailored to their needs, ensuring a seamless digital presence.

### Target Market
Take App caters primarily to small businesses looking to leverage the popularity of WhatsApp for sales while avoiding complex setups and excessive transaction fees commonly found in traditional e-commerce platforms.

### Pricing Structure
- **Basic Plan:** Free forever for hobbyists, offering unlimited WhatsApp orders.
- **Premium Plan:** $14 per month for solo entrepreneurs, including additional features such as analytics and payment processing.
- **Business Plan:** $38 per month for teams, which includes more extensive capabilities like shared team inboxes and custom APIs.

### Customer Experience
Take App has received positive feedback from users, who praise its ease of use and the smooth experience it provides in managing orders and payments. Customers appreciate the reduction in platform juggling, thanks to Take App's all-in-one approach.

### Conclusion
Take App stands out in the e-commerce space by tapping into the familiarity and convenience of WhatsApp commerce. Led by a skilled founder, it offers small businesses a simplified, effective way to engage with customers and drive sales without complicated maneuvers. If you're looking for a way to streamline your orders on WhatsApp, this could be the tool you need.
